tabData.title: GitHub Copilot - AI won’t take your job, but an engineer using AI might
tabData.text:
We know what GitHub copilot is, now let’s turn the volume up to 11! An adventure on what you can achieve with the tools being implemented by the Engineering Platform.  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Stuart Fosker

tabData.title: Evolution of CWAs and front end Development - Interstellar
tabData.text:
Transforming a 3-6mth, engagement heavy implementation, to a self service deployment from your pipeline in 64mins with no engagements!  
 Critical Skill : **DevOps**
tabData.name: Mike Daniels

tabData.title: Cloud Run & Azure Fun
tabData.text:
Serverless computing is gaining traction - and for good reason. It helps teams deliver faster, with fewer resources, and with reduced environmental and financial impact. In this session, we’ll share why Lloyds Banking Group is following a serverless containers rather than a FaaS (Functions as a Service) approach, what capabilities are already in place, and what’s on the horizon as we continue to expand our offerings.  
 Critical Skill : **Solution & Technical Architecture**
tabData.name: Paul Gledhill

tabData.title: Internal Developer Platform
tabData.text:
Join us for an rapid tour of our new Internal Developer Platform - In 25 mins we will bust the myths of What is the IDP ? What is a Golden Path, then we'll show you how we use the Backstage Portal to deploy an Interstellar Web App Golden Path and build and Deploy it with Harness.  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Andy Page & Dan Davy

tabData.title: Method and Tooling: Accelerating our Product Mindset’
tabData.text:
We’re curating a Product Hub to support Platform colleagues with applying product principles into your ways of working! The Product Hub is a self-serve resource providing guidance, coaching and action planning,  tools, and links for applying a product mindset across your teams. It also provides all you need to know to create your Product Hierarchy and Roadmap to visualise your vision! Intended for BU/Platform/Lab leads, Product Owners, Engineers, Customer Journey Managers, and Integrators, the hub contains resources on product hierarchy application, how to create and maintain your product roadmap, self-reflection frameworks, inclusive design, data-driven decision-making, and product discovery. Come along to hear more about how we can accelerate our Product Mindset!  
 Critical Skill : **Product Delivery​**
tabData.name: Jas Sambhi

tabData.title: Technology Strategy 3.0: Our vision to be the UK’s Biggest FinTech
tabData.text:
Join us to reveal our latest technology strategy outlining how we Simplify to fix yesterday's complexities, Modernise with the technologies of today, Pioneer by building for tomorrow and Engineering with Excellence by putting the best talent, agile processes and tools at the heart of everything we do. Technology Leadership.  
 Critical Skill : **Technology Leadership​**
tabData.name: Jonathan Blease

tabData.title: Gen AI Enablers- From the ground up
tabData.text:
Come and hear from our team on how we're building the platform that will support the creation and delivery of GenAI use cases across the organisation. The session will include a showcase of our API that allows you to harness powerful foundation models on real internal data, an insights piece on how we've used Gemini in one of our current use cases, and some exploration into the further possibilities of what GenAI can do.  
 Critical Skill : **Data Science**
tabData.name: Jehangir Chaudhry

tabData.title: An Introduction to M365 Copilot​
tabData.text:
Introduction to MS 365 Copilot presentation showcases how Copilot boosts productivity and creativity across Microsoft 365 apps with AI-powered assistance and highlights various learning opportunities Technology Intelligence. 
 Critical Skill : **Technology Intelligence**
tabData.name: Oliver Butterworth​

tabData.title: Beyond the Prompt: Gauging and defending the attack surface of RAG Systems
tabData.text:
This talk dives beyond the prompt to explore the multifaceted attack surface inherent in the Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. It will discuss how integrating external data and components expands security considerations far beyond initial user queries. It will also cover the understanding of the real-world attack vectors - including RAG database poisoning, securing the RAG architecture and permission misconfigurations - and learning the practical strategies to mitigate the critical risks to confidentiality, integrity and availability in such AI deployments. Information Security.  
 Critical Skill : **Information Security ​**
tabData.name: Tanzil Rehman

tabData.title: Quality Reimagined​
tabData.text:
How autonomous feature teams and AI-driven automation will accelerate engineering excellence at scale—alongside a demo on Athena & Pegasus DevOps.  
 Critical Skill : **DevOps​**
tabData.name: Vinod Sukumarvictor

tabData.title: DAST Automation and Pipelines
tabData.text:
Discover how to automate DAST and integrate with pipelines to help achieve 80% security automation, shift left and improve quality safely. Learn about our STRADA approved strategy for API and web application security testing, how we’re supporting engineers, making use of AI and our roadmap for 2025. Security Engineering.  
 Critical Skill : **Security Engineering**
tabData.name: Chris Smith

tabData.title: Device Choice - Bringing Mac to the masses
tabData.text:
A brief journey into the new device choices allowing the engineers to work from the Operating system of their choice Colleague Experience.  
 Critical Skill : **Colleague Experience**
tabData.name: Jess Huckson

tabData.title: All Aboard the Transport Platform Express!
tabData.text:
Join us to lift the lid on Transport Platform, where tech meets travel! We’ll explore the business, meet the brilliant team, and lift the lid on our tech stack and job families. Finally, we’ll look ahead to the exciting work on the horizon and how we’re gearing up for the road ahead.  
 Critical Skill : **Technology Intelligence**
tabData.name: Richard Horvath

tabData.title: AppViewX Automation
tabData.text:
Introduction to AppViewX Automation for Cert+ (Certificate management) and ADC+ (Application Delivery Controller) workflows currently in use by Networks Lab (F5)
 Critical Skill : **Technical Operations**
tabData.name: Dave Wilcocks & Keith Scully

tabData.title: IBM Power VS - Private Cloud
tabData.text:
The Bank runs a lot of critical applications on IBM Power / AIX. As we migrate into the new data centre (P4) we are adopting a modern private cloud solution from IBM known as Power VS. This session will explore what Power VS is, the contents of a pod, the control and data planes and much more!  
 Critical Skill : **IT Platforms and Hosting**
tabData.name: Paul Hancock & Gavin Lloyd

tabData.title: Learning to run in the Cloud - where are the biggest challenges?​
tabData.text:
Get the latest view on how we are tackling the challenges of running in Cloud with Carol Morris - Head of Public Cloud SRE. 
 Critical Skill : **IT Platforms and Hosting**
tabData.name: Carol Morris & Steph Miller

tabData.title: Putting new and emerging technologies to the test… the power of relentless experimentation​
tabData.text:
‘I was at an incredible conference last week and all these amazing AI startups were demoing some incredible AI… I think we need to start using it pronto…’​ Sound familiar? With the explosion of AI startups on the scene you’re probably hearing this phrase every single week or even saying it yourself. But how do you really know whether this shiny new technology is really going to solve your problem and unlock the value your new startup friends are promising?​ Join us to find out what it really takes to experiment with new technologies and how to spot the difference between the good, the bad, and the downright ugly. During this session we will be providing helpful tips on how to identify and test emerging technologies at pace, to separate the wheat from the chaff, and how to keep your friends in architecture happy in the process. 
 Critical Skill : **Technology Intelligence**
tabData.name: Bea Schofield

tabData.title: Mastering Skills: Your Path to Excellence​
tabData.text:
Discover effective strategies to enhance your technical skills. This 30-minute session will cover identifying key areas for improvement, setting goals, a 
 Critical Skill : **Continued Learning​**
tabData.name: Charlotte Boults

tabData.title: Developing AI applications to streamline Engineering workflows​
tabData.text:
In this presentation, Bish will describe how his team went from a hackathon idea to a working application to help engineers. He'll describe some of the difficulties that he faced as well as giving insights in to the next generation of AI applications being developed to support colleagues. 
 Critical Skill : **Product Innovation and Development**
tabData.name: Richard Bishop

tabData.title: Morning Meditation
tabData.text:
15 minute meditation  
 Critical Skill : **Resilience, Wellbeing & Adaptability**
tabData.name: Alex Reynolds

tabData.title: Managing Stress. What is stress? Tools and techniques to help you manage it.
tabData.text:
A brief look at how stress affects us, with practical tools like the stress bucket and meditation to help manage it. We’ll also point you to helpful resources on the Safety, Health and Wellbeing site.  
 Critical Skill : **Resilience, Wellbeing & Adaptability**
tabData.name: Kirsty Mott

tabData.title: Work smarter to get faster
tabData.text:
A brief look at how stress affects us, with practical tools like the stress bucket and meditation to help manage it. We’ll also point you to helpful resources on the Safety, Health and Wellbeing site.  
 Critical Skill : **Resilience, Wellbeing & Adaptability**
tabData.name: Kirsty Mott

tabData.title: Afternoon Meditation
tabData.text:
15 minute meditation  
 Critical Skill : **Resilience, Wellbeing & Adaptability**
tabData.name: Alex Reynolds

tabData.title: Work smarter to get faster
tabData.text:
Through game-based learning you will develop the skills to better understand how much work you have in progress, how to avoid blockers and improve your speed of delivery. You'll learn how to deliver more without working any harder.  
 Critical Skill : **Agile Methodology and Tools**
tabData.name: Sarah Miles

tabData.title: Running Live Service for Engineers
tabData.text:
Join us for an energising workshop that dives into what it really means to run a service—from building it right to supporting it effectively in a platform model where you build it, you run it. You’ll hear directly from the experts behind our Digital Services as they walk through high-level processes, share real-world insights, and offer practical tips to help you avoid the dreaded 3am support call. Whether you're new to service ownership or looking to sharpen your approach, this session will leave you with valuable takeaways to elevate your service game.  
 Critical Skill : **Technical Operations**
tabData.name: Simon Adams

tabData.title: Running Live Service for Engineers
tabData.text:
Join us for an energising workshop that dives into what it really means to run a service—from building it right to supporting it effectively in a platform model where you build it, you run it. You’ll hear directly from the experts behind our Digital Services as they walk through high-level processes, share real-world insights, and offer practical tips to help you avoid the dreaded 3am support call. Whether you're new to service ownership or looking to sharpen your approach, this session will leave you with valuable takeaways to elevate your service game.

tabData.text:
Through game-based learning you will develop the skills to better understand how much work you have in progress, how to avoid blockers and improve your speed of delivery. You'll learn how to deliver more without working any harder.  
 Critical Skill : **Agile Methodology and Tools**
tabData.name: Sarah Miles

tabData.title: Building and Deploying Apps with Backstage and Harness
tabData.text:
Join us for an immersive hands-on technical workshop where we will guide you through the process of creating an app using our Internal Developer Platform, providing a comprehensive engineer's experience from start to finish.​ We will provide you with all the necessary access and resources, along with step-by-step guidelines. Our experts will be on hand to assist and answer any questions you may have, ensuring you gain practical, hands-on experience.​ Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills, learn from industry experts, and collaborate with fellow engineers.​  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Tony Phillips & Asa Harland

tabData.title: Building and Testing API Endpoints with Quarkus and TDD
tabData.text:
Learn how to implement and test API endpoints using Quarkus and Bruno. This workshop covers running Quarkus code, experimenting with Test Driven Development (TDD), and is suitable for both beginners and experienced developers.  
 Critical Skill : **Software Engineering**
tabData.name: Charlotte Boults

tabData.title: Building and Deploying Apps with Backstage and Harness

Our experts will be on hand to assist and answer any questions you may have, ensuring you gain practical, hands-on experience.​ Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills, learn from industry experts, and collaborate with fellow engineers.​
